title: Unable to exit apps after installing July 2020 Android Security Update
content:
1. Unable to close all the tabs using Pixel assistant button on home screen. Few application doesn't show home or back buttons/icons when launched. e.d. Amazon Prime, Clash Royale etc. We have to restart the phone to exit those apps.
2. Phone always resets to default for theme, wallpaper, font size  etc after restarting.
3. Lot of apps lost permissions after installing. E.g. Whatsapp

Is there a way to revert from this update?
